title: Spreadsheet import activity configuration

@context.description: JSON-LD context for interpreting the configuration as RDF

columnRange.title: Column Range
columnRange.description: The range of columns to be imported (e.g. columns 2 to 7)

rowRange.title: Row Range
rowRange.description: The range of rows to be imported (e.g. rows 1 to 15)

emptyCellValue.title: Empty Cell Value
emptyCellValue.description: The value to use for empty cells. The default is ""

columnNames.title: Column Name Mapping
columnNames.description: Mapping from column to port names

allRows.title: Import All Rows
allRows.description: Imports all the rows containing data

excludeFirstRow.title: Exclude First Row
excludeFirstRow.description: Excludes the first row from the import

ignoreBlankRows.title: Ignore Blank Rows
ignoreBlankRows.description: Excludes blank rows from the import

outputFormat.title: Output Format
outputFormat.description: How the activity outputs are to be formatted

csvDelimiter.title: CSV Delimiter
csvDelimiter.description: The delimiter to use for CSV input files. The default is ','

excludes.title: Excludes Ranges
excludes.description: The ranges to exclude from this range
